questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar cod again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Damage / Incident and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/Philips MP 30/VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/Philips MP 30/VIDEO FOR CHECKING POWER CORD CONTINUITY.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING POWER CORD CONTINUITY

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether the input AC voltage of 230 is available
check whether there is any carbon formation or breakage of input pin connector.
clean or replace the input pin connector accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing AC I/P pin connector

questions.question: check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from pin connector to power supply board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the fuse is blown out or defective.
replace the fuses with a new one
check and confirm whether the power supply output voltage is available.
repair or replace the power supply accordingly
check and confirm for any loose connection or breakage of cable from Power supply Board to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the BP Cuff deflates immediately or improper deflation after the inflammation.
cross check the NIBP Cuff and confirm for any damage and breakage in the tubing.
replace the NIBP cuff with a new one
repair or replace the MPM module accordingly
check and confirm whether there is no inflammation of cuff during NIBP is measured.
cross check the cuff and confirm for any damage or breakage of the cuff.
replace the cuff with a new one
repair or replace the MPM Module
check and confirm whether Sensor off or SPO2 off message appears on the display.
check the pulse Oxi probe connector for any damage or improper connection
replace the connector with the new one or reconnect properly
repair or replace the MPM Module accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is black or plain.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from control board to display.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair or replace the backlight accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display appears as white screen.
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from backlight to display.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
replace the display with a new one
check and confirm whether the buttons does not respond while pressing.
check the continuity of switches and confirm they are defective.
replace the switch accordingly
repair or replace the switch control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
